marginalia.translation: The Moon in the first of seventh [house].

marginalia.anchor_text: Si mors homnum, omnibus ex genitura decerneretur, impossible esset clades magnas aut pestilentias aduernire

position.marginalia_text: Mors o[mn]iu[m] no[n] decernitur ex genitura, sed interdu[m] ex caussa universali sup[er]venie[n]te in Revolutione [et cetera]. Vide supra.

marginalia.translation: The death of every [person] is not discerned from a geniture, but sometimes from a universal cause coming up in a revolution, et cetera. See above.
